Package cryptoTrader.utils

Class Operation

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.utils.Operation
public class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
Date: April 3, 2022 This class will hold the operation object which stores each operations broker, coin list, and trading strategy. With these variables the class has a method which executes the trade by recieving the appropriate action made by trade strategy. This class uses the Facade design pattern in the executeTrade method.
Author:
Ethan Borg and Michael Mendes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Operation​(TradingBroker tradingBroker)
    This constructor method will take in a trading broker object and distribute its contents into the other variables in the class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TradeActivity executeTrade()
    This method executes a trade by calling the tradingStrategy class to obtain the action to take based on the coins price value.
    java.lang.String getBrokerName()
    This method returns the value of the trading brokers name
    CryptoCoinList getCoins()
    This method returns the coin list which holds all the used coins for each particular trade
    TradingBroker getTradingBroker()
    This method returns the trading broker object assosiacted with the operation
    java.lang.String getTradingStrategy()
    This method returns the trading strategy used for the operation

  • Constructor Details

    • Operation

      public Operation​(TradingBroker tradingBroker)
      This constructor method will take in a trading broker object and distribute its contents into the other variables in the class
      Parameters:
      tradingBroker - is a TradingBroker object which stores information about each trading broker

  • Method Details

    • getBrokerName

      public java.lang.String getBrokerName()
      This method returns the value of the trading brokers name
      Returns:
      brokerName is the name of the broker as a String

    • getTradingBroker

      public TradingBroker getTradingBroker()
      This method returns the trading broker object assosiacted with the operation
      Returns:
      tradingBroker is the object for the trading broker

    • getCoins

      public CryptoCoinList getCoins()
      This method returns the coin list which holds all the used coins for each particular trade
      Returns:
      coins is the object for the CyrptoCoinList

    • getTradingStrategy

      public java.lang.String getTradingStrategy()
      This method returns the trading strategy used for the operation
      Returns:
      tradingStrategy is the String for the strategy used

    • executeTrade

      public TradeActivity executeTrade()
      This method executes a trade by calling the tradingStrategy class to obtain the action to take based on the coins price value. This information is then used to make a tradeActivity object which is used to track each trade
      Returns:
      the TradeActivity object which holds the information for one trade
